rows.label: qev011201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey! You! Do you have any interest in the Miran
ecosystem?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Er, sorry. That kind of came out of the blue, didn't it?
Look, don't run. I'm not trying to recruit you into a cult
or anything. I'm just searching for a kindred spirit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_JNK0010
rows.name: Show Interest

rows.label: qev011201_SEL0011
rows.name: Express interest in the Miran ecosystem.

rows.label: qev011201_JNK0020
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev011201_SEL0021
rows.name: Yawn and tell Sullivan you aren't interested in science.

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Wait, really? Oh my gosh. You're the first person who
hasn't just dismissed me out of hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Yeah, no shock there. But even if you do feel that way,
could I maybe interest you in some work?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0005
rows.name: You're entirely free to take or leave it, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0006
rows.name: Just hear a gal out, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0007
rows.name: My name is Sullivan, and I'm a botanist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ever since we arrived on Mira, my lab has been
blessed with one fantastical specimen after the next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0009
rows.name: The biodiversity here is simply dizzying![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0010
rows.name:
I might as well tear up that doctorate I earned back on
Earth and use it to wipe my...um...floor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0011
rows.name:
But really, this is great news. I've never seen such fertile
ground for academic curiosity! Even the leaves—have
you noticed the leaves? Most have these little—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Am I rambling? I'm rambling. And you're bored.
So sorry. Let me get back to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0013
rows.name:
To get to the point, I'd like your assistance in my
research.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0014
rows.name:
As I'm sure you know, there's a huge forest area to
the northwest of NLA. We call it Noctilum. The plant
life there is wholly unlike anything seen on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0015
rows.name:
I suspect the marshes deep within that forest might
hold a specimen of extreme importance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0016
rows.name:
I've been informed by many parties that collecting this
specimen will be no simple matter, but I'm thinking
someone like you should be able to handle it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0017
rows.name:
I require three samples—one to experiment on, one to
archive, and one to display so that the public's appetite
for science might once more be whetted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0018
rows.name:
The Miran ecosystem is shrouded in mystery and
intrigue, but this inquiry will be the shaft of light
which pierces the veil![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0019
rows.name: All of science hinges upon your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0020
rows.name:
My curiosity in Mira's ecology is boundless.
I could spend my life wrestling with its mysteries—
and fates willing, I shall![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Research samples of these plant species are lacking.
Would that I could go and collect them myself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0022
rows.name:
For men and women of my academic inclination, Mira
is a paradise! A Midas vault of new scientific inquiry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0023
rows.name:
Ah, yes, hello!
Tell me, how goes the specimen collection?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0024
rows.name:
Astonishing... Yes, thank you!
These are fine samples, truly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0025
rows.name:
I'd heard speculation about this specimen's unusual
properties, but this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0026
rows.name:
No, I mustn't draw any conclusions before a proper
investigation is completed. Hypotheses and evidence
and so forth, yes? Yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0027
rows.name:
And yet, I think it's possible that the plant this was
harvested from actually exists OUTSIDE all known
Miran ecological chains![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0028
rows.name: It's bizarre... But in the most delightful way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0029
rows.name: Life on this planet shocks me each and every day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Er, speaking of, I realize this is something of a surprise
request, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0031
rows.name:
might it be possible—and I dearly hope that it is—
to enlist your help in gathering another set of samples
of a different specimen?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0032
rows.name:
Water drains from those marshes, you see, forming
a river.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0033
rows.name:
That river's current carries a multitude of seeds to their
future homes. The importance of these seeds cannot be
overstated![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0034
rows.name:
They must be studied in minute detail if our analysis of
life on Mira is to advance to the next stage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0035
rows.name:
I need an archive sample, a test sample, a display
sample, a training sample, a buttering-up sample for
sponsors, and a bonus sample for a birthday present.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0036
rows.name:
So, yes. That's six samples total.
A hefty sum, I know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0037
rows.name:
But all are vital to the continued function of
science on Mira. Thank you, assistant!
You have my eternal gratitude.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0038
rows.name:
The reproductive cycle of plants is the underpinning of
all life, and yet so many people remain apathetic.
They are inviting disaster, I assure you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0040
rows.name:
Welcome back! Judging by your demeanor,
I anticipate good news?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0041
rows.name: Yes! Precisely the specimen I desired![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0042
rows.name:
Er, of course I say "desired" only in the sense that it is
vital to my research! Not that I... *ahem!* Right then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0043
rows.name:
I'm impressed you actually brought samples for storage,
research, display, training, sponsor kickback, AND
birthday purposes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0044
rows.name:
You are a wonder, [ST:gender p1=sir p2=madam ], and a champion for
Miran botany.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0045
rows.name:
Though your actions may not make it into my research
paper, know that the results of your work shall live on
for all time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0046
rows.name:
If nothing else, please look upon your contributions
with great pride![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0047
rows.name:
Oh, and you'll be pleased to know that I finished
analysis on the samples of the first specimen you
brought me earlier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0048
rows.name:
It's shocking, really. The plant changes on a cellular
level between morning and night to become a wholly
different organism.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0049
rows.name:
It goes beyond any conventional definition of the word
"plant." It's... Well, it's an "entity," I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0050
rows.name:
Just another in a long list of assumption-shattering finds
on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0051
rows.name:
I well realize gathering those samples was not easy.
You have my sincerest thanks, kind [ST:gender p1=sir p2=madam ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0052
rows.name:
If I require hard-to-obtain samples again in the future,
I hope you'll lend me your services once more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0053
rows.name:
For storage, test, display, training, sponsor, gift, award,
propaganda, and, er...personal use. *cough*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011201_MSG0054
rows.name:
Hey, one can never have too many samples, right?
Remember, this is all about science![ST:wait ]
